tool_description: This is a lightweight REST API which scraps torrent data  from popular torrent site
name: torrent-scrapper-api
title: torrent-scrapper-api

api_list.name: get all trending data
api_list.description:
this endpoint returns relevant tranding data relevant to following keyword
keyword
other
anime
music
applications
television
games
movies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://torrent-scrapper-api.p.rapidapi.com/top/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "torrent-scrapper-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get trending movie/anime/music/applications/television/movies/games/others
api_list.description:
this endpoint return trending data for following category:
other
anime
music
applications
television
games
movies

import requests

url = "https://torrent-scrapper-api.p.rapidapi.com/top/movies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "torrent-scrapper-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://torrent-scrapper-api.p.rapidapi.com/top/{topkey}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "torrent-scrapper-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get today popular movies/anime/tv/games/music/apps/other_copy
api_list.description: this endpoint return popular data about particular category for today like - movies/anime/tv/games/music/apps/other
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://torrent-scrapper-api.p.rapidapi.com/popular/movies/day"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "torrent-scrapper-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get week popular movies/anime/tv/games/music/apps/other
api_list.description: this endpoint return popular data about particular category for current week like - movies/anime/tv/games/music/apps/other

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "torrent-scrapper-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
